meanings.definition: Representing something else by association or resemblance.
meanings.sent1: The symbolising necklace she wore reminded her of her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a symbolising bird that represented freedom.
meanings.sent3: The symbolising hat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a symbolising sun, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The symbolising flower in the garden caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Serving as a symbol of something.
meanings.sent1: The symbolising flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The crown was a symbolising item of royalty.
meanings.sent3: The symbolising cake at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a symbolising sound of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The symbolising statue in the park attracted many visitors.
